localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
blogPost.body: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
blogPost.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
blogPost.author: Argyrou Argyris

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

previous.excerpt: Most businesses don't have enough time or resources to capture the Customer Success Stories that build trust and authority. Our chatbots automatically ask your customers the right questions to generate engaging stories and compelling social proof.
previous.title: Wizu Stories - Collect customer success stories and compelling social proof

localize.description: 大多数企业没有足够的时间或资源来捕捉建立信任和权威的客户成功故事。我们的聊天机器人会自动向您的客户提出正确的问题，以生成引人入胜的故事和令人信服的社交证明。
localize.tagline: 收集客户成功案例和令人信服的社会证明

localize.description: 大多數企業沒有足夠的時間或資源來捕捉建立信任和權威的客戶成功故事。我們的聊天機器人會自動向您的客戶提出正確的問題，以生成引人入勝的故事和令人信服的社交證明。
localize.tagline: 收集客戶成功案例和令人信服的社會證明
